Package it.polimi.ingsw.client.control

Class Controller

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.client.control.Controller
public class Controller extends Object
The client side controller of the application. Manages server-events: instructing the UI to display the changes sent by the server. Manages user-messages: checking the correctness of the message, displaying so that it can be consumed and sent to the server.

  • Property Summary

    Properties

    javafx.beans.property.SimpleBooleanProperty

    • Controller

      public Controller()

  • Method Details

    • initUI

      public void initUI(ProgramOptions.ProgramMode mode) throws IllegalArgumentException, IllegalStateException
      Creates the game's UI given the chosen client's ProgramOptions.ProgramMode. Starts the UI thread.
      Parameters:
      mode - the client's ProgramMode chosen by the user.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the given mode is not valid
      IllegalStateException - if the game's UI is already initialized

    • setOnEnd

      public void setOnEnd(Runnable callback)
      Sets the callback for the controller end event. If null is passed, an empty callback is set.
      Parameters:
      callback - the callback to call on end

    • manageServerEvent

      public void manageServerEvent(com.google.gson.JsonObject o) throws com.google.gson.JsonSyntaxException
      Given the command received from the server, updates the game's state; calls the view's methods to display the changes to the user.
      Parameters:
      o - the JsonObject corresponding to the message received from the server
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the server message is null
      com.google.gson.JsonSyntaxException - if the given string json object is not valid
      IllegalStateException - if the game's UI has not been initialized yet

    • manageUserMessage

      public void manageUserMessage(com.google.gson.JsonObject o) throws IllegalStateException, IllegalArgumentException, com.google.gson.JsonSyntaxException
      Given the message received from the user, it either performs client side operations or sets the userMessage to be consumed by the server. After, the onUserMessageCallback is called.
      Parameters:
      o - the user-message
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - if the game's UI has not been initialized yet
      IllegalArgumentException - if the given user-message is null
      com.google.gson.JsonSyntaxException

    • toMainMenu

      public void toMainMenu()
      Sets the application's state to the main menu.

    • toDisconnectState

      public void toDisconnectState()
      Sets the application's state to be disconnected.

    • setOnUserMessage

      public void setOnUserMessage(Consumer<com.google.gson.JsonObject> callback)
      Sets the callback for the userMessage event. If null is passed, an empty callback is set.
      Parameters:
      callback - the callback to call on end

      public Controller.Status getStatus()
      Returns the status of the application.

      the status of the application

    • toRun

      public boolean toRun()
      Returns true if the application is not be to be shut down, false otherwise
      Returns:
      true if the application is to keep running

      public void setToEnd()
